thread.title: Moment Jamie Foxx caught up in mass brawl at Hollywood restaurant after being 'attacked by diner'
thread.title_full: Moment Jamie Foxx caught up in mass brawl at Hollywood restaurant after being 'attacked by diner'

author: Natalie Evans
title: Moment Jamie Foxx caught up in mass brawl at Hollywood restaurant after being 'attacked by diner'
text:
Celebs Moment Jamie Foxx caught up in mass brawl at Hollywood restaurant after being 'attacked by diner' The actor was reportedly lunged at by a man who accused the star and his friends of making too much noise Share By Natalie Evans Joshua Haigh 01:12, 10 JAN 2017 Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Dramatic moment Jamie Foxx is ATTACKED in Hollywood restaurant Share this video Get celebs   
Dramatic footage has emerged purporting to show the moment Jamie Foxx was caught up in a mass brawl at a Los Angeles restaurant. 
The actor was reportedly attacked while dining at celebrity hotspot Catch in West Hollywood on Saturday night. 
Foxx, 49, was in the patio area with friends when a man reportedly approached his table and accused the group of making too much noise. 
The man allegedly became aggressive and told the star: "You don't want to mess with me. I'm from New York," according to TMZ. Read More Jamie Foxx arrives at Catch restaurant before trouble kicked off (Photo: Splash News) The star was dining with friends in West Hollywood (Photo: Splash News) 
A witness told the website that the disagreement turned nasty when the man lunged at Foxx. 
Eyewitness reports vary, but one onlooker told the website the man actually made contact with Foxx, pulling him down onto a table. 
It is claimed the film star ended up "turning the guy around" and "putting him in a choke hold" to bring the altercation to an end. A huge brawl kicked off in the restaurant (Photo: TMZ-AKM-GSI-XPOSURE) The actor was later seen being driven away from the restaurant (Photo: MEGA) 
Mobile phone footage has now emerged showing a number of people involved in a scuffle at the restaurant. 
A woman can be heard repeatedly telling the attacker to "calm down" as the row descends into chaos. 
The man is believed to have been thrown out of the restaurant, as stars including Jerry Bruckheimer, Cuba Gooding Jr. watched from the sidelines. Jamie Foxx on The Ellen Show (Photo: Ellen) Katie wasn't there at the time of the incident (Photo: Splash) 
For over a year they've been forced to deny rumours that they are dating, but Jamie and Katie Holmes' 'secret' romance was all but confirmed last year. 
According to reports, the handsome actor rang in the new year with his rumored girlfriend of over three years. 
"They're very serious," a source told Us Weekly of the relationship. 
Mirror Celeb has contacted Jamie's rep for comment. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
